00014 TTValue::TTValue()
00015 {
00016         data = new DataValue;
00017         data->float64 = 0.0;
00018         type = new TTDataType;
00019         *type = kTypeNone;
00020         numValues = 1;
00021 }
00022 
00023 TTValue::TTValue(TTFloat32 initialValue)
00024 {
00025         data = new DataValue;
00026         data->float32 = initialValue;
00027         type = new TTDataType;
00028         *type = kTypeFloat32;
00029         numValues = 1;
00030 }

00141 TTValue::~TTValue()
00142 {
00143         delete []type;
00144         delete []data;

00149 {
00150         return *type;

00155 {

00161 void TTValue::setType(TTDataType arg)
00162 {
00163         *type = arg;
00164 }
00165 
00166 
00167 void TTValue::setNumValues(const TTUInt16 arg)
00168 {
00169         if(arg > numValues){
00170                 delete []type;
00171                 delete []data;
00172                 type = new TTDataType[arg];
00173                 data = new DataValue[arg];
00174         }
00175         numValues = arg;
00176 }
00177         
00178 
00179 TTValue& TTValue::operator = (const TTValue &newValue)
00180 {
00181         // TODO: what about freeing and allocating memory to hold the value(s)?
00182         type = newValue.type;
00183         data = newValue.data;
00184         return *this;
00185 }

00188 // FLOAT32
00189 TTValue& TTValue::operator = (TTFloat32 value) 
00190 {
00191         *type = kTypeFloat32;
00192         data->float32 = value;
00193         return *this;
00194 }
00195 
00196 TTValue::operator TTFloat32() const
00197 {
00198         if(*type == kTypeFloat32)
00199                 return data->float32;
00200         else{
00201                 TTUInt16 index = 0;
00202                 TTFloat32 value;
00203                 CONVERT
00204                 return value;
00205         }
00206 }

00427 TTValue::operator TTSymbol&() const
00428 {
00429         if(*type == kTypeSymbol)
00430                 return *data->sym;
00431         else{
00432                 return (TTSymbol&)TT("");
00433         }
